alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 06 at 3:06PM AKST until February 06 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Over Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Drifting snow will make travel difficult. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds should decrease this evening and conditions should slowly improve this evening.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
